pages.title: Welcome to Vue Page Editor
pages.content:
Welcome to Vue Page Editor

This is your home page. You can edit this content or create new pages using the navigation menu above.

pages.title: New Page
pages.content:
Task Overview:

Develop two interconnected projects - the first is a Vue 2 application featuring a rich text editor, and the second is a Nuxt 3 application for server-side rendering of HTML content generated by the first project.

pages.title: New Title
pages.content:
Requirements:

  • Framework: Utilize Nuxt 3 for building the application.

  • State Management: Use Pinia for efficient state management.

  • Data Retrieval : Fetch the HTML content generated by the Vue 2 application using  Axios from the local json-server.

  • Server-Side Rendering : Ensure the HTML content is rendered on the server side.

  • UI Packages: You are free to use any UI packages.
